Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to preventing retaliation against incarcerated individuals following the filing of a grievance
Summary: Limits retaliation against incarcerated individuals following the filing of a grievance, by requiring more than the oral or written statement of the subject of a grievance filed by an incarcerated individual for the purposes of finding such incarcerated individual guilty at an evidentiary or disciplinary hearing for misbehavior.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to preventing retaliation against incarcerated individuals following the filing of a grievance
